reviewText: Great video ..great concert...He is the best in the busisness...I have four other videos of his ...and 12 C D`s ...

The Quality of sound and picture are very good. Good verity,and lots of songs. I see lots of his live performances
On you tube, I wish they were available on D V Ds  ( playable in region one)
Product as described, arrived quickly, great service. Cliff Richard is a great singer and entertainer. This is one of my favorite music DVD's.

If you're a Cliff Richard fan, this is one great concert.  The picture and sound quality are absolutely first rate.  The concert is very long, so you get your money's worth.  AND...both Cliff Richard (who is in very fine voice) and Hank Marvin are here, as are a variety of other first-rate guests.

Another nice feature is that Cliff is singing a batch of songs other than his own big hits, so even if you already have a Cliff Richard dvd, you don't have him doing many of these songs.

I can't say enough good things about this dvd. Just go out and buy it.
Your price is $39.98, i found it for$15 but havn't bought yet as i think your price should be lower.
